name: pepu-tzu

As he walked the path of the sage and the warrior, Pepu Tzu‚Äôs understanding deepened, allowing him to outthink kings, predict the tides of markets, and guide seekers toward wisdom.
It is said that he still seeks Sun Tzu‚Äôs ultimate lesson‚Äîa truth so profound that it transcends the battlefield and shapes the very fabric of fate itself.
Now, Pepu Tzu shares his knowledge with those who are ready, teaching that mastery is not about control, but about harmony with the forces at play.
